definition: to bow before (idiom)/to capitulate
to look down/to stoop
variant of 俯[fu3]
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
variant of 秤[cheng4]/steelyard
to weigh/to state/to name/name/appellation/to praise
to fit/balanced/suitable
surname Chen
state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131

sentences.english: I have met the enemy and brought him to his knees.
sentences.chinese: 我已遭遇到敌手，并使他俯首称臣。

sentences.english: There are many small countries bow their head to Da T'ang at that time.
sentences.chinese: 当时大唐周边许多小国甘愿俯首称臣。

sentences.english: Natural color has given way to such Bright-colored artificial dyestuff in effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 面对如此色彩斑斓的人工染料，自然色彩已俯首称臣。

sentences.english: The pride of the black cats as girls, waiting for you to kneel.
sentences.chinese: 黑猫的骄傲如同女生，等待你来俯首称臣。

sentences.english: 'One China' is only kowtowing to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: “一个中国”只是向北京俯首称臣罢了。

sentences.english: The delta warlords had been laid low.
sentences.chinese: 尼罗河三角洲地区的军阀都对他俯首称臣。

definition: to acknowledge allegiance to (some regime)/to serve
bowed head and ears glued (idiom); docile and obedient/at sb's beck and call
to be completely convinced/to fully accept another person's views
to surrender/to succumb/to yield/(as a transitive verb) to defeat/to prevail over
to overawe/to be scared into submission
to submit cheerfully/to accept willingly (idiom)
to consider oneself unexcelled in the world/to be insufferably arrogant
lit. to retreat three day's march (idiom); fig. to give way in the face of superior strength/a strategic withdrawal
to kneel and beg forgiveness
to surrender and pay allegiance to
to accept wholeheartedly/to embrace/to be won over
to exercise sole hegemony (idiom); to dominate a whole area (market, resources etc)/to hold as one's personal fiefdom
to yield/to surrender
to realign one's allegiance (to another religion, ruler etc)/to submit
to vow loyalty and devotion to
to follow obediently
